name: Color Dream
description:
Color dream is a new coloring game for all ages!

Surprising you any time! Relax and enjoy your colorful day!

-Easy-to-handle game with swiping and rotating.
-Using physical effects to make it easier.
-Collecting the lucky pieces and unlock the hidden themes.
-Tell your friends and start the collection challenge!

We are ready to make your game experience even greater! Our team reads all reviews and always tries to make the game better. Please leave us some feedback if you love what we do and feel free to suggest any improvements.
